page.title: 09Brightwalton Village Hall
page.content: {The Village hall}is used for many things related to the Village. Every {Monday,Wednesday and Friday}during term time the{Pre_School Nursery}is held for{eighteen children.On Thursday morning{Toddlers Group}is held and in the summer the{Cricket Club}use it for home matches.The{Evergreen Club}(over 60s) use it{once a month}the{Garden {Club}use it{twice yearly}for meetings. It is available for hire for Birthday parties,Young Farmers dances, private functions and other dances.Two dances a year are run in the hall as well as Bingo at Christmas,the{Annual Village {Fete,committee meetings}and a touring theatre uses it once a year.In the last six months the Hall has had an extension which includes a{kitchen, {sitting area,committee room, and store {room adjoining the main hall.
